messages.title: Victory in Betting Shop Campaign
messages.content: David Lammy and the Harringay Labour team have secured a commitment from the national Labour Party to legislation giving councils and local residents the power to stop the proliferation of betting shops in their areas.

messages.title: Labour government introduce stricter HMO rules
messages.content: Housing minister John Healey has introduced stricter rules for houses in multiple occupation (HMOs).

messages.title: A Greener Green Lanes
messages.content: Your Harringay Labour Action Team have secured funds for better green spaces in our local area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce legislation to give councils and local residents the power to limit the number of betting shops.
Introduce stricter rules for houses in multiple occupation to ensure better standards and tackle irresponsible landlords.
Invest in local green spaces, including securing funds to improve Parkland Walk and Ducketts Common.

issues.environment: Secured £175,000 from Transport for London to improve Parkland Walk. £100,000 secured to improve Ducketts Common.

housing.content: Stricter rules for houses in multiple occupation (HMOs) introduced by Housing minister John Healey.

contactInformation.address: Haringey Labour, Freepost, 28 Middle Lane, N8 8PL

images.caption: David Lammy and Harringay Labour team with 'Haringey Labour says no more betting shops' sign.
